resources.string: Your device is out of memory.
Are you sure you want to exit?
Press again to exit the app.
A new version is available. Please update the app to continue.
A new version of %s is available. Please update the device to continue.
Network unavailable. Please check the network.
You have not bound any cameras yet.
Failed to load. Click to try again.
Low battery! Please replace or charge the battery ASAP.
Please allow the app to access your album for image and video storage.
Please allow the app to access your camera to scan QR codes and take photos.
Please enable the camera access in phone settings.
Please allow the app to access your microphone for two-way talk.
Please allow the app to access your microphone for audio recording.
Please enable the microphone access in phone settings.
Notifications may include alerts, sounds, and icon badges. These can be configured in Settings.
You\'ve created an account with this Email address. Please log in to your %s account first and bind to this third-party platform.
Password must be at least 8 characters.
A verification email has been sent.
No email received? Click to resend.
Unverified email address. Please verify first.
This feature is currently unavailable. Please upgrade the app to retry.
Uploading. Please wait and don\'t exit.
The device is upgrading. Please wait patiently and don\'t cut off the power.
Type in no more than %d characters
Please read the %s and %s carefully before using this application. Click \"%s\" to indicate that you accept and are bound to these terms.
Please read the %s carefully before using this application. Click \"%s\" to indicate that you accept and are bound to these terms.
Join %s to help improve our products and service. You are free to quit the program via settings at anytime.
Please choose a browser to proceed.
Are you sure to delete the selected file(s)?
Are you sure to delete the file?
Too many attempts. Please try again later.
Continue to play over cellular data?
Low battery in camera[%s]! Please replace the battery now.
Low battery in camera[%s]! Please charge the battery now.
I have read and agree to %s and %s.
I have read and agree to %s.
Too many attempts. Please try again in %s.
Please log in first for Cloud storage settings.
You have ever logged in via the third-party platform bound to this email address. Please try with your third-party account.
This platform has not bound an Email address yet. You may create a %s account to log in.
Please get the new password according to the email instructions within %d minutes.
Your device \"%s\" requires connection to your Wi-Fi network. Tap OK to configure Wi-Fi access.
Before you start, make sure your home Wi-Fi network is available.
%s:The camera\'s network connection will time out in 5 minutes. If you need more time to finish the Wi-Fi setup, please restart the camera.
Choose your preferred Wi-Fi network and then enter its password. Tap %s to continue.
Please pay attention to the camera voice prompt. If you hear the voice prompt \"Wi-Fi is connecting\", tap \"I Heard It\" to proceed. If not, please tap \"Cancel\" and try again.
When you hear %s from the camera, tap %s to continue.
Note: If the camera fails to connect to your Wi-Fi, you\'ll hear %s. Tap %s to go back and set up Wi-Fi again.
Are you sure you\'ve heard \"Wi-Fi connection succeeded\"?
Are you sure you\'ve heard \"Wi-Fi connection failed\"?
The camera has connected to your Wi-Fi network. Now your smartphone will automatically switch back to your frequently-used Wi-Fi connection. Tap %s to continue.
Note: For some older smartphones, you may need to manually connect them to your Wi-Fi again.
Your Wi-Fi settings may not be correct. Please check the information again and tap %s.
1. Press the Home button on your smartphone, go to Wi-Fi settings and connect to the camera (%s).
2. Return to the app and try configuring Wi-Fi for the camera again.
Connection failed. Make sure the phone is on the same network as the camera.
Tap %s to connect again. It may take a few minutes.
The camera name cannot be blank.
Please name your camera according to its location and set up a password for secure access. The password must be at least 6 characters.
Tip: Use a password that\'s memorable and not easily forgotten.
Please name your device and create a strong password with at least 6 characters.
Tap %s to start watching your camera\'s live video stream.
Click here to live view in a floating window.
To live view in a floating window, please search picture-in-picture in phone settings and enable it first.
Share videos to win special gifts.
Share to #%sCaptures and win special gifts.
Low resolution! Videos under fluent stream mode are not supported. \nPlease upload clear videos instead.
Click to open the side menu and find more videos under #%sCaptures.
Please select the Wi-Fi to which the device is going to connect.
I prefer to use Ethernet cable.
If you prefer to connect your camera with an Ethernet cable, you may skip Wi-Fi settings. Are you sure to continue?
Trying to connect to the router. Please wait patiently for a few seconds.
Warning: Formatting will erase all data on SD card and device will reboot. Are you sure you want to proceed?
Warning: Formatting will erase all data on SD card. Are you sure you want to proceed?
Warning: Formatting will erase all data on disk. Are you sure you want to proceed?
Before synchronization, please make sure all the cameras are connected and can display images.
No images on your camera after synchronization? Try the following to fix it.
1. Connect the camera to an NVR with network cables.
2. Wait a few minutes until you hear two beeps, indicating that the Wi-Fi configuration is successfully synced and the camera will reboot soon.
3. Connect the NVR to the router again with a network cable after the above steps. Refresh and check the camera connections.
2. Please scan the QR code on your phone with the camera until you hear \"Scan Succeeded\".
For more configurations, please go to the %s to proceed.
Failed to set up the name.
Save the device QR code to your smartphone.
%s has been online for %d minutes. The device will enter sleep mode in %s seconds to reduce power consumption.
%s has been online for %d minutes. The device will enter sleep mode in %s seconds to reduce power consumption and data use.
Swipe left to enter immersive live view mode.
Using the default password is not secure, we recommend that you change your password now!
Failed to obtain PTZ information. Please tap to retry.
This camera does not support the \"PTZ\" function.
You don\'t have administrator permission to proceed with \"PTZ\" function.
Drag the central button to control the \"PTZ\" direction.
You have reached the maximum number of patrol points.
A maximum of 10 positions can be deleted simultaneously.
Failed to save recording files because recorded videos cannot be played on this iPhone.
Due to the poor network quality, please tap here to switch the playing mode to %s.
Place the phone to your ear.
You don\'t have administrator permission to proceed with \"Talk\" function.
Try the following to have a better experience:
Turn off the speaker next to the talkback, and then place the phone to your ear.
If this doesn\'t work, please use earphones.
Failed to access clip info. Please retry.
This camera does not support the \"Clip\" function for the time being. You can get this feature by upgrading the camera to the latest software version.
The current device does not support the \"Clip\" function.
Drag the rectangle to the position you want to see.
Failed to set up video color mode.
Please switch to the normal speed for video recording.
Slide to quickly locate a specific time.
Click to play or download the videos.
Drag the icon to control video progress.
Failed to load video info. Please tap to retry.
This camera does not support playback.
There are no recordings for the current time.
The downloaded video length is set to a suitable length by default. You can also customize the video length (up to %s seconds).
Failed to download. iPhone doesn\'t support videos in this resolution.
You are now using 3G/4G network. Do you want to continue the download?
The phone storage space is less than 50M. Please free up some storage space on your phone.
There are no videos over the time period you selected.
While your clip is downloading please ensure that your app stays open and your phone does not lock.
Please view the downloaded file in your phone’s photo library.
Cancel will stop the download and clean the downloaded data. Are you sure you want to cancel?
Please refresh to update your files.
No available devices detected.\n Are you sure to continue?
You haven\'t added any devices. Please click the \"+\" button in the top right corner to add one.
Click the \"+\" button of the %s to add a camera.
You have received new alarms. Please note to check in time.
The device is not online. Please check the network and power supply of the device.
The device is not online. Please check the network and battery power of the device.
Please disable push notifications for this device first.
Are you sure you want to delete the device?
Failed to delete device. Please check your network connection.
Failed to delete device. Please try again.
Please create a password using at least 6 characters.
Your password can\'t be longer than 31 characters.
When PIR sensor is disabled, you will not receive email alerts, sound alarms and app push notifications. There will be no video recordings.
Customize sensitivity in different time frames.
If you have received frequent alarms by waving objects within the monitoring zone, please enable this to reduce false alarms.
Please ask your family or friends to launch the app, tap \"+\" button and scan the QR code.
Login failed. Please %s if you have forgotten your passwords.
Select devices and customize alarm settings.
Please select devices for this scene.
No devices are added to this scene.
Are you sure to delete %s mode?
Note: View/Edit email addresses for notifications in security camera settings.
Tap the icon to activate scene mode. \nLong-tap to edit settings.
Under scene mode, you can customize alarm options for each security camera on different occasions. \nActivate or switch scenes with a single tap.
Here is how to create a new scene:
Device name has a maximum length of 31 characters (including English letters, numbers and space characters).
The following devices trigger motion detection too frequently.
The following devices have a low battery. Please note to replace or charge the battery in time.
Are you sure you want to delete %s from %s?
Connection failed. Please try again or %s.
Properly install and use the camera.

Battery cameras are not designed for 24/7 continuous recording. To reduce battery power consumption, the camera will only wake up when motion events are triggered or when you access the camera via Client or App.
1. CR123A non-rechargeable battery (3.0V) \n2. CR123A rechargeable battery (3.6V - 4.2V)
Do not use batteries of different models together.
Do not use new and old batteries together.
Remove the battery when you are not using the camera.
The camera detects events with a PIR motion sensor. Proper installation of the camera (sensor) helps reduce false alarms and save battery power.
Don\'t point to frequently moving objects.
The default sensitivity of the PIR sensor is at \"Mid\" and the detecting distance is 6 meters (20ft).

Please note that the higher the sensitivity, the longer the detecting distance, but it may cause more false alarms. You are advised to set up the sensitivity level to \"Low\" or \"Mid\" if your camera is installed outdoors.

The default sensitivity of the PIR sensor is at \"Mid\" and the detecting distance is 6 meters (20ft). To adjust the sensitivity, please launch your %s app and tap \"PIR Settings\" under \"Device Settings\".

%s is not designed for 24/7 live view and recording. Battery in the packet can sustain up to 180 days in standby mode, or up to %s minutes of motion recording or live view. To extend battery life, it’s advisable to install and use %s properly.
The camera\'s PIR is enabled by default. You can enable/disable the PIR based on the specific needs.
Go to \"Device Settings\", and tap \"PIR Settings\" under \"Alarm\". Then click \"Schedule\" of the following page.
Tap the grid box and change the grid color into grey when you want to disable the PIR.
Press the button in the top right corner to save the settings.
To copy the schedule to other time periods, tap \"Copy To\" and choose the targeted days you want.
Do you want to save and add this device?
The device has been added successfully.
Extend it to 2-year and a half for FREE, and more ownership benefits.
Please create a password according to the Email instructions.
This account has been bound to other %s accounts.
Your current account is not secure. You need to create a password for the account before unbinding. Continue?
Are you sure you want to unbind?
New password cannot be the same as the current one.
Please enter the new Email address.
A verification email has been sent. Valid within %d minutes.
Please click the link in the Email within %d minutes to finalize the change.
Please enter the password to verify your account.
Please use the new email address for future logins.
Store All Moments That Matter, in a Much Safer Way
Control Your Security Camera Hands-Free - Just Ask
Save Everything That Matters,\n Just in Case

%s Cloud can record videos every time motion is detected. No worries for missing a thing, even if your device is stolen or Micro SD card is broken. Access your Cloud video history anytime, from anywhere.
You can add up to %d device(s) to Cloud.
Videos will be overwritten in loop.
No camera is on the plan.
More plans are to be launched soon. Please stay tuned!
You may check for more plans.
Is this plan not suitable for your need?
You can only switch your plan once within %d days.
Video uploading failed. Please unbind the camera first and rebind it to Cloud again.
Speed up video playback to enjoy important one-day moments within minutes.

It can\'t be easier to control your %s security cameras that come with smart home integration. Just with hands-free voice commands, you can watch the real-time images of your doorstep, backyard and baby’s room on the screen easily. Enjoy smart home feature now!
%s, now works with smart home platforms, so you get live streaming of your security camera, just by asking.
Use simple voice commands to control your camera and get things done.
Managing your home security has never been easier.
No devices support the smart home function.
Unsupported device version. Please update your device.
You have selected %d video(s). Are you sure you want to delete?
You haven\'t added any device that supports cloud service.
You have not added any devices that support Cloud service. Please click to check %s.
You haven\'t bound any device yet. Please go to the \"Device Settings\" - \"Cloud Storage\" to bind a device.
Access captured images and videos in the album.
Allow the camera to access all available servers for more stable network connection.
Enter live view page when the App starts.
Add devices to the device list automatically in LAN
Be alerted when playing videos with cellular data.
Adjust device order for a quicker access to your favorite devices. This order applies to device list and live view page as well.
Please disable this feature if you meet compatibility issues when playing the videos.
Please create password using at least 4 characters.
Please enter the app password and new password.
Please enter the username and password of the camera.
The device will be added to the list for next login if you choose to return. Are you sure you want to return?
Connection failed. Please check whether the device and your phone can access the Internet.
Username or password is incorrect! Please try again.
The device name cannot be blank.
Failed to add device. Please check your phone network and ensure the UID is correct.
UID is invalid. You can scan the QR code on the device to get the correct UID.
Scan the QR code on the device.
Align QR Code within frame to scan.
No access to the phone camera.
No access to the camera. Tap to set up.
No QR code detected. Tap to continue.
These devices are detected under the Wi-Fi your smartphone is connected to.
No devices are detected under the Wi-Fi your smartphone is connected to.
No WiFi network available. Please connect your smartphone to Wi-Fi first to find devices within Wi-Fi coverage.
Connect the camera to a Wi-Fi network
Camera has already been set up. I just want to access camera.

%s securely connects your wire-free cameras to the Internet via your home router, and provides long range Wi-Fi connectivity and the best battery life for your cameras. You will get key features like SD card local storage.
You haven\'t added any %s. Please scan the %s QR code to add a %s.
\"Please run app, add the camera and set it up.\"
I didn\'t hear the voice prompt
Enable location service to access Wi-Fi info.
Switch Wi-Fi in your phone settings.
Your Wi-Fi settings will be configured to your camera.
Please proceed according to the voice prompt you hear.
\"Scan succeeds. Camera is connecting to your router. Please wait.\"
Please solve the QR code mismatch problem with the following methods:
If you have bought multiple security cameras, please don’t mix the rear covers together.
The QR code number on your phone might be different from that of you camera. Please check if the last four figures of the QR code number on the camera is %s. Scan the QR code after correct match.
If it still displays \"QR code does not match\" after trying the methods above, please contact the support team.
Camera is connecting to your router. Please wait.
Please check if the battery is correctly installed.
The camera is not reset yet. Please long press the \"reset\" button until you hear the voice prompt.
Please face the camera towards QR code and keep scan distance around 20cm (8 inches).
Failed to connect to the router?
If you heard \"Wi-Fi connection failed\", follow the steps for troubleshooting:
The Wi-Fi or password you entered is incorrect.
The device is too far from the router.
Possible reasons why you didn\'t hear the voice prompt:
Only the battery powered security cameras support voice prompt. Please check the type of product purchased.
If you have installed battery in the camera but still don\'t hear the voice prompt, please long press the \"reset\" button (as shown in the picture) until you do.
Possible reasons why connection to the %s failed:
Camera is too far away from the %s, or there are thick blocks in between.
Only the battery powered security cameras can connect to the %s. Please check whether the type and version of the camera purchased support it.
No available cameras detected. Please add camera to the list before binding it.
After your family or friends launch the app, click the \"+\" button and scan the QR code.
When disabled, you will not hear sound in live video or playback.
The infrared lights will turn on automatically in dim conditions.
Turn on/off the blue light in the camera.
Status LED is a built-in light near the lens that indicates if your security camera is connected to a stable network.
With the feature enabled, infrared red lights will turn on automatically as illuminators in the dim light.
Allow the camera to send notifications to your phone.
The content has changed. Do you need to save?
Restoring the device to factory settings will unbind all cameras and reboot the device itself but won\'t delete the uploaded footage. Are you sure to continue?
Are you sure to restore your system to factory settings?
Are you sure to reboot the device?
Please enter a name for your camera to display.
Overwrite when the device storage is full.
Start recording before the alarm is triggered.
The time during which camera will continue recording after the trigger event stops.
Unable to send emails without sender information.
Unable to receive emails without recipient information.
You can add up to three recipients.
A test email has been sent to the recipient email. Please check it in your inbox.
Failed to send the test email. Learn more about %s.
1. Ensure that you have enabled the SMTP in your mail settings.
2. Check whether mail server and recipient info are entered correctly.
3. Check your network connection and try again.
Device will delete all the recording files in the selected disks. Continue?
Camera will delete all the recording files and reboot. Continue?
%s will delete all the recordings files in the SD card. Continue?
Your %s is not formatted yet and you need to format it before use.
Your %s are not formatted yet and you need to format them before use.
Your SD card is not formatted and you need to format it before use.
The higher resolution you have chosen, the clearer videos your security camera can capture.
The higher frame rate you have chosen, the smoother your videos will be.
Under the same resolution and frame rate, your security camera can present better image quality with higher bitrate. (And it may take more bandwidth.)
These changes will not take effect until you reboot your device. Continue?
The information you input can achieve normal connection.
Change of Wi-Fi information may result in connection failure. Are you sure to continue?
Wi-Fi settings will take effect after the network cable is unplugged. Continue?
When disabled, movement will not trigger any alarms.
The higher the sensitivity you set, the easier it is for the camera to trigger alarms.
Create a zone over the area you don’t want to receive alerts about.
You can record up to %d seconds.
Incorrect device time? Sync with phone
Device time still incorrect after syncing to phone? Please check DST settings.
Once deleted, the account would be invalid and cannot access the device. Are you sure to continue?
All cameras will be unbound after changing password. Are you sure to continue?
Password reset succeeded. You need to rebind cameras to the %s.
All cameras will be unbound after changing password.
You have reached the maximum number of cameras.
One camera can only be bound to one %s.
Footage will not be uploaded after you unbind security camera(s).
Download timed out. Tap \"Upgrade\" to try again.
Error in downloading file. Tap \"Upgrade\" to try again.
Upgrade failed. Tap \"Upgrade\" to try again.
It is detected that %d of your devices need to be upgraded.
Please don\'t cut off the power during the upgrade process.
Connection failed. Please check your phone network and login again.
It may take several minutes for the device to upgrade and restart. Please don\'t cut off the power during the process.
The camera has a low battery. Please upgrade when it is fully charged.
Daily Remaining Battery for the latest 30 days.
Statistics will be recalculated after the device restarts.
This will allow us to access your device\'s online status to provide you with accurate battery consumption data. Note that you can change the permission anytime.
Allow the app to access your device\'s battery usage info for the last 4 weeks?
If you stop calculation now, the recording and calculation of device\'s online status will be terminated, and the relevant data will be deleted.
Running time includes the time taken to trigger alerts and access the device from app or client.
Abnormal battery condition in camera [%s]! Please check if the battery is correctly installed.
Abnormal Battery Condition! Please follow the steps for troubleshooting.
Please check if the battery is loose.
Please check if the old and new batteries are used at the same time.
Please check if the rechargeable and non-rechargeable batteries are used at the same time.
Please check if batteries of different brands are used at the same time. Please install the specified batteries.
The above problems will affect the battery life. Please be sure to check carefully.
This table shows the daily time of battery used by live view & motion recordings at full capacity. Please note:
This table shows the statistics recorded when the camera is connected to Internet. When network is disconnected, the statistical information will not be recorded.
The battery power consumption of the camera at night almost doubles that in the daytime.
Battery power consumption of the camera in standby mode will greatly increased if your Wi-Fi router has a weak signal or is heavily loaded. But the consumption is not displayed in this table.
The number in orange is reminding you that your camera has been running at full capacity for 10 minutes (daytime) or 5 minutes (nighttime) in a single day.
%s uses PIR sensor to detect motion. When triggered, the camera will wake up and run at full capacity to record. To minimize battery drainage, please configure the PIR properly:
Select the channel(s) that will start recording when motion is detected.
Trigger alarms when motion is detected in the image.
Trigger alarms when PIR is activated and motion is detected in the image.
Customize email alerts at different time.
Customize push notifications at different times.
Customize voice alerts at different times.
Please set up alarms after selecting time.
Please enable/disable recording after selecting time.
Please enable/disable email alerts after selecting time.
Please enable/disable push notifications after selecting time.
Please enable/disable audio alarm after selecting time.
Please choose the detection type(s) for email alerts after selecting time.
Please choose the trigger type(s) for recording after selecting time.(Note: Choosing \"Timer\" may increase the risk of SD card damage. )
Please choose the detection type(s) for recording after selecting time.
Testing FTP server connection... Please wait.
The device will restart after the video standard is modified.
Bind error! Please contact customer support.
Device is bound to another account.
You have removed the device from the plan. The device will stop uploading videos.
Didn\'t get the email? Please resend.
Unverified account. Unable to set up Cloud recording.
The videos will not be uploaded if you choose to cancel now. Are you sure you want to proceed?
Video uploads will be unavailable if you choose to unbind (the recordings can be saved in Cloud for 7 days at most). Are you sure you want to unbind?
Do not lock the screen or run the app in background, otherwise the upgrade may not succeed.
The downloaded data will be empty if you exit now. Are you sure you want to exit?
The current version of this device doesn\'t support cloud storage. Please upgrade it to work with cloud service.
New version detected. Please upgrade the device before you use the function.
Please %s first to use the smart home skills.
Failed to enable smart home skills.
Failed to disable smart home skills.
Add devices to the device list automatically within the LAN.
To make sure the app works properly, allow %s to access the following:
to send push notifications to your phone.
Note that video quality may be lowered when the network signal is poor.
No camera SD card is detected. You may not access playback feature.
HDD is not formatted. You may not access playback feature.
Camera SD card is not formatted. You may not access playback feature.
No HDD is detected. You may not access playback feature.
Please cut off the power of your camera and insert an SD card as instructed.
No camera SD card is detected and you cannot access the playback feature. Please cut off the power of your camera and insert an SD card as instructed.
No camera SD card is detected and you cannot access the playback feature. Please cut off the power of your camera and insert an SD card.
No HDD is detected and you cannot access the playback feature. Please cut off the power of your NVR and install an HDD.
1. Long press the reset hole/button on the camera for 5-10 seconds to reset your device to factory settings.
1. Long press the reset hole/button on the camera for 5-10 seconds to reset your device to factory settings. It may take 1 min to reboot your camera, please wait.
2. After resetting, Wi-Fi info, camera login password and other related info will be erased and need to be reconfigured.
2. After resetting, Wi-Fi info, camera login password and other related info will be erased and need to be reconfigured. Please make sure the network is available before reconfiguration.
Please make sure the camera is powered on and the network is available.
Please make sure the camera has been reset.
Failed to load the instruction image.
Please make sure the camera is powered on.
Successfully reset. Start the initial setup for your camera.
Tap to turn on the spotlight. It will turn off automatically in %ss if there is no motion detected.
Turn on spotlight at night for higher-quality color image.
Press and drag to draw a black rectangle (up to %s) on the screen to block out a specific area.
One tap to control motion alerts of all devices.
Name the scene and select a scene icon.
Select devices and customize alarm settings according to your needs.
Control motion alerts of all devices with a single tap. For example, you may disable all alerts when you are at home.
No device is connected. You may not access scene modes.
With PIR sensor enabled, the camera will try to notify you via push notifications and email alerts when it detects motion events.
With PIR sensor enabled, the camera will try to notify you via push notifications, email alerts and audio alarms when it detects motion events.
PIR is off. You\'ll not receive any alerts.
PIR is off. The camera will not record motion events.
When the camera detects motion events, it will try to notify you via push notifications and email alerts.
When the camera detects motion events, it will try to notify you via push notifications, email alerts and audio alarms.
With the feature enabled, the camera will record videos to SD card for later playback.
With the feature enabled, the camera will record videos to HDD for later playback.
The siren will sound when motion is detected.
The buzzer will sound when motion is detected.
With the feature enabled, you\'ll receive emails when motion is detected.
To keep email alerts private and secure, please add your personal email as the sender.
You\'ll only receive one email alert within the email interval.
You\'ll receive instant email alerts during selected time frames when motion is detected.
You\'ll receive an email alert every %s.
Test whether your mailbox can receive email alerts normally.
You\'ll not receive any email alert during selected time frames.
The camera will record motion-triggered videos during selected time frames.
The camera will record videos continuously during selected time frames.
The camera will record videos continuously and identify motion-triggered footage during selected time frames.
The camera will not record any videos during selected time frames.
To connect your camera to Wi-Fi network, face it to your phone and let the camera scan the QR code on the screen.
Administrators can access the device, change device settings and manage all users.
Users can access the device and change their own login passwords, but are not allowed to alter device settings.
The camera will record videos in color mode with adequate lighting and switch to black & white mode in low-light conditions automatically.
* Only available in black & white mode.
The current environment is too dark to support color mode.
Please enter English letters, numbers, spaces or special characters (including - + { } [ ] =) only.
Please enter English letters, numbers and English punctuations only.
The content length exceeds the allowable limit.
Keep me up to date on news and exclusive offers.
All existing privacy masks will be removed if you want to re-edit. Are you sure to continue?
Upgrade your device to use Cloud service.
Please don\'t cut off the power during the upgrade process or it may lead to device damages.
You need to configure Wi-Fi settings for the newly added or reset devices.
I have heard the voice prompt
Only 2.4 GHz Wi-Fi supported. 5 GHz network is not available now.
Camera is connecting to the router…
Make sure you have proceeded according to the voice prompts.
Customize the device to display live view and record videos in colors or in black & white.
The Cloud and Smart Home features of this device will stop working once the device is deleted.
The Cloud feature of this device will stop working once the device is deleted.
The Smart Home feature of this device will stop working once the device is deleted.
Please refer to the following and try again:
Connect your phone to the same Wi-Fi network as the camera.
Put the camera closer to the router.
Reboot the router or the camera.
Are you sure you want to restore the device?
Once the device is restored, all settings of the device will be erased. Only Wi-Fi info and recordings will be retained.
Once the device is restored, all settings of the device will be erased. Only recordings will be retained.
After restoring, please wait for 30s to 3 mins. Then initialize the device and log in again.
Please select file(s) for download first.
Get FREE 6-month extended warranty in seconds, and more ownership benefits.
Register Now to Get 2-Year & Extra 6-Month Warranty (FREE)
Extended warranty is valid for purchases made within 2 years from the date of the invoice.

Registered products enjoy a 2-year standard warranty and a 6-month extended coverage. If you are not sure whether some products have been registered, just select them and fill in relevant information. One product can be registered repeatedly but its warranty can only be extended once.
We collect and use your information above for identity verification.
By clicking %s you agree to the %s and %s.
You can register all Reolink products under the same order if you forget the specific order number of each product.
Please enter a valid email address.
Q: Why some products are not shown on the selection list?
Q: What if I forget the order No. of each product?
A: You can register all Reolink products under the same order if you have multiple orders but forget the specific order number of each product.
Login successfully. You can check the account information on the side menu.
When this feature is enabled, previous videos will be overwritten by new files once storage space is full.
See more clearly in dim light with IR lights on.
IR lights will automatically turn on in dim light and turn off when there is sufficient lighting.
Motion detection on one camera can trigger other cameras to record simultaneously. Please select co-record cameras.
The camera you choose requires at least 10 Mbps upload speed.\nPoor network condition will result in slow or failed uploads.
Videos will be kept in Cloud for a shorter time. \nThe clearer the videos, the larger the size. These large video files will eat the cloud storage quickly.
Only product model and UID will be submitted for warranty verification.
Connection failed. Click to try again.
All settings will be erased once the device is reset. To reset, please follow the onscreen instructions until you hear the voice prompt.
Enable to receive alerts on your phone once the camera detects motion events.
Enable to receive alerts on your phone from each channel of the device when motion is detected.
The camera will try to send you real-time notifications when it detects motion events.
The %s buzzer will sound automatically when motion is detected.
Connection to %s failed. Click to try again.
Camera at higher sensitivity detects every small change in the field of view, such as a sneaky person at a distance.
Camera at medium sensitivity is moderately sensitive to changes, such as pets and dubious people not far away.
Camera at lower sensitivity only detects motion of bigger objects, such as running cars and people nearby.
Spotlight will turn on automatically when alarm is triggered at night, and turn off after a while.

Since email alert is sent via your mailbox, you\'re required to enter your email password or the app password generated by your email account (The password will only be used for sending email alerts and will not be used for other purposes).
You can manually adjust device time when it is inconsistent with your phone time. After adjustment, the date, time, time zone and time format will be synced with your phone\'s settings.
Enable Record Audio so that you can hear sounds.
The administrator has disabled Record Audio and no sound will be recorded.
Enjoy comfort of use at night with Dark Mode.
This will be the standard time for the device\'s date and time and the timestamp shown on recorded videos, live view and playback screen.
Please enter the SMTP server information.
A verification email has been sent to your email account.
Please click on the link in that email to verify your email account within 60 mins.

Please make sure your device is powered on and connected to a stable network before retry.
Failed to send email alerts without sender and recipient info.
Only the latest setting (shown on the top) will be saved when you set up one period more than once.
Please power on the camera and wait for the voice prompts.
I have heard %s from the camera.
Please face the camera towards QR code and keep scan distance around %s.
Didn\'t hear voice prompts or heard %s?
Make sure your camera is not too far from the router.
It may take several minutes for the device to upgrade. Please don\'t cut off the power during the process or it may lead to device damages.
The update may take about 3 minutes.
Enable to receive motion & low battery notifications.
The toggle state, on or off, will be applied to all cameras under NVR.
You will receive mobile push notifications when motion is detected.
If you prefer Wi-Fi connection and have not configured it yet, click here.
If you prefer network cable connection, click here.
Have Wi-Fi Configured or Network Cable Connected?
If you have plugged in a network cable to the camera, please unplug the cable and reboot the camera. Do not plug in the network cable before Wi-Fi configuration succeeded.
Please plug in power cable and network cable as instructed before accessing the camera.
Please select at least one option.
Customize detection type and schedule for event recording. During the enabled time frames, your camera will record when it detects specific events.
Customize schedule for continuous recording. During the enabled time frames, your camera will record non-stop.
Customize detection type and schedule for email alerts. During the enabled time frames, you will receive email alerts when your camera detects specific events.
Customize schedule of regular email alerts. During the enabled time frames, you will receive email alerts at regular intervals.
Customize detection type and schedule for push notifications.
Customize detection type and schedule for siren.

Customize to enable/disable recording after selecting preferred time frames. (Note: If you plan to record continuously to SD card, please select proper time frames, otherwise it may lead to SD card damages.)
Failed to connect to the device.
No SD card detected. To use this feature, please turn off the camera and insert an SD card.
SD card not formatted. To use this feature, please format SD card first.
Time lapse feature enables you to capture hour-long or even day-long events, like sunrise, blooming and the work of building, etc. into minute-long videos or photo albums.
Step 1: Select a Scene for Time Lapse Capture
Time lapse capture will start at %s.
When you click Finish, the camera will stop capturing while the generated files remain. Are you sure to finish now?
The app requires access to your location to calculate sunrise or sunset time. Note that your location info will not be saved or used for any other purpose.
Previous time lapse files will be overwritten when storage is full.

Note: Battery may drain faster with time lapse enabled. Please pay attention to battery usage and charge in time when low battery warning appears. Or you can disable PIR to reduce battery consumption.
Note: You can only save up to %s photos per day. You are recommended to set up shooting in a shorter period or at a longer interval, or record videos instead.
When enabled, time lapse capture will stop automatically after duration time.
The overwrite feature applies to all time lapse files created by this device. You may disable it on Time Lapse - Settings page.
To reduce file size, you may choose a lower quality or snapshot at a longer interval.
Are you sure to delete this file(s)?
Caching is required before you can play the video.
A newer part of the video has been generated. Caching is required before you can play the full video.
There are other time lapse videos in the cache process. Please try later.
Time lapse video cache has finished but part of it is damaged.
You are using mobile network now and caching may lead to excessive data use. Are you sure to continue? \nFile size: %s
By stopping caching, you will remove all the cached content. Are you sure to stop now?
There is insufficient space on your phone. Please free up space and try again.
Files have been saved to phone.
Failed to save video. Please try again.
Failed to share video. Please try again later.
Caching is required before you can share the video. \n File size: %s

The app cannot calculate sunrise or sunset time since location services have been disabled. Please try again after enabling location services in system settings.\nNote that your location info will not be saved or used for any other purpose.
Please stop the time lapse capture before modifying video quality, otherwise some of the time lapse feature may not be available.

Cache is the temporary data generated when you use the app. Clearing cache will not affect the normal use of the app. After clearing, you may need to re-cache the contents that had been cached previously.
After clearing, you may need to re-cache the contents that had been cached previously. Are you sure to clear?
Failed to obtain cached data. Please try again.
There is not enough storage available. Please free up space or clear cache in Settings on side menu and try again.

When day breaks or night falls, capture may switch between color and black & white. To capture in one color mode only, you may go to camera live view page - three-dot menu - Day and Night to choose the preferred mode. Note: With this altered, live view and record will change accordingly.
Certified refurbished products enjoy a 1-year warranty & another 6-month coverage.
Please register certified refurbished products within 1 year.

With Samba enabled, you may access the files stored on %s on a computer within LAN. It is recommended that you apply this service on non-public network only.

How to configure Samba on your PC? 
Open File Explorer - Type in \\%s - Press Enter - Type in username (admin) and password (the one you use to login your device) 

How to configure Samba on Mac? 
Open Finder - Click "Go" button on the top menu - Click "Connect to Server" - Type in smb://%s - Click "Connect" - Type in username (admin) and password (the one you use to login your device)
With Samba enabled, you may disable it on %s settings page later.
Failed to enable Samba. You may enable it again on settings page.

By deleting the device, you will only remove %s from device list. No files will be deleted and the binding remains.

This device has been bound to %s. If you prefer Cloud services instead, please unbind it from %s first and retry.

1. Please long press the reset button of the camera until you hear the voice prompt.
Spotlight auto turns on when viewing live feed and turn off afterwards.
Adjust spotlight brightness according to ambient lighting.

Spotlight stays on in night mode.

Device cannot send email alerts without email info.
Gmail and Yahoo Mail are recommended.
Email address may contain only English letters, numbers, and “@ - + _ .” Note: No spaces are allowed.
You\'re recommended to login %s with app password.
Why should I enter email password?

To keep email alerts confidential and protect your privacy, all email alerts will be sent via your own email. Thus, the email password or app password, which is more secure, is required. The password will be used to send email alerts only and not for any other purpose.\n\nNote: The app password setup guide for %s and %s is provided. For email services from other providers, please contact the respective providers for more info.

To keep email alerts confidential and protect your privacy, all email alerts will be sent via your own email. Thus, an SMTP server is required. 

If you are using email services from Gmail, Outlook, Hotmail, Yahoo, iCloud or Zoho, the server info is automatically filled in, and you don't have to enter or alter it. 
If you are using email services from other providers, contact them for more SMTP server info.
Incorrect SMTP server info or port. Please correct it and try again.
Device network error. Please try again.

Incorrect email password or SMTP not enabled. Please troubleshoot as follows:\nStep 1: Make sure the SMTP server is enabled for your email. For details of how to enable it, please contact the email provider.\nStep 2: Make sure that you enter the correct email address and password. Some email can only be accessed by entering an app password. Please set the app password and try again.
Check if you have typed in a correct email address or try with another email address.
Device cannot send email now. Please wait and try again later.
Unknown error. Please try with another email address.
Email is sent via the first address to all addresses below.
After you delete this recipient, it will no longer receive email alerts about this device. Are you sure you want to delete %s?
Device will no longer send email to this email address after you clear the settings. Are you sure to continue?
Email is sent via the first address to recipient(s).
You will not receive email alerts without a recipient.
You will no longer receive the email alerts after deleting this email. Are you sure to delete it?
You will not receive email alerts without a sender.
How can I reset the device that is out of reach?

1. Ask a family member or trusted friend to follow instructions and press the reset button on camera. 
2. If you can access the device on PC, log in to %s Client, restore the device to factory settings and create new device password. 
If your family member or trusted friends can access the device, you may ask them to restore the device to factory settings and create new device password. 
%s
%s
How can I reset the device via %s App?
How can I reset the device via %s Client?

Mark the current position as a preset point to set the patrol route.
Device will auto return to the initial monitoring position after deviating.

You can choose more than one type.
The time that a detection object can stay in detection zone without triggering alarm.
Alarm will be triggered when a detection object stays in detection zone longer than the set time.
Filter out detection objects by size.
Camera at high sensitivity detects moving objects with low-similarity appearance to persons.
Camera at medium sensitivity detects moving objects with medium-similarity appearance to persons.
Camera at low sensitivity only detects moving objects with high-similarity appearance to persons to reduce false alarms.
Camera at high sensitivity detects moving objects with low-similarity appearance to vehicles.
Camera at medium sensitivity detects moving objects with medium-similarity appearance to vehicles.
Camera at low sensitivity only detects moving objects with high-similarity appearance to vehicles to reduce false alarms.
Camera at high sensitivity detects moving objects with low-similarity appearance to animals.
Camera at medium sensitivity detects moving objects with medium-similarity appearance to animals.
Camera at low sensitivity only detects moving objects with high-similarity appearance to animals to reduce false alarms.
Moving objects that are smaller than the minimum object size or bigger than the maximum object size will not trigger alarm.
Moving objects that are smaller than this size will not trigger alarm.
Moving objects that are bigger than this size will not trigger alarm.
PIR is off, and detection alarm will work after PIR is turned on.

Or add devices in the following ways
Product IP can be used to add device or access device information.

When you use the Reolink smart home system, our server needs to access content and related information that is captured and recorded on the Reolink App. But these data will only be sent to the intelligent terminal, and we will not save or process any of them. Please feel at ease to enjoy Reolink smart home.
I acknowledge and accept the Notice.
When disabled, camera will send alerts about the whole detection coverage. \nWhen enabled, camera will detect motion and send alerts about the created detection zones.
Smart pet detection is added! This function is currently used to keep an eye on your dogs and cats.
When enabled, you can customize the camera to record videos and send alerts when it detects pet detection events, and filter recordings by pet when viewing the playback.

Note: This function is still in the internal testing stage and there is a probability of false alarm. If there is any, please feel at ease to share more details with us on our official website, which will help improve the products and user experience.
Go Black & White when ambient light falls below the set brightness value.
Black & White and Color Switching Threshold
Ambient brightness threshold when switching between Black & White and Color in Auto mode of Day & Night:
Switch to Black & White when the current threshold is lower than the previous one.
Switch to Black & White when the current threshold is higher than the previous one.
Synchronously adjust left and right cam to avoid brightness difference
Toggling the switch will reboot the device
When motion is detected, you will hear the pre-alarm sound from the camera, indicating the camera is determining the motion. The pre-alarm may last 3 seconds.
Please move close to the camera to test the pre-alarm sound.
Save the QR code of the device to album for sharing, adding or maintaining the device later.

Password must be at least 6 characters.
Password must be at least 2 types of of characters including digits(0-9), capital letters(A-Z), lowercase letters(a-z) and symbols.

Critical Alerts always play a sound and appear on the lock screen even if your iphone is muted or Dn Not Disturb is on. Manage Critical Alerts in Settings.
